name: Carnivorous Ship
description: A gargantuan ship with an amorphous form that can transform into a traditional vessel, known for its immense size and ferocity on the battlefield.
memorable: The ability to polymorph into a ship and generate controlled undead drones makes it a unique and formidable foe.
goals: To traverse land and sea, dominating its surroundings and controlling drones for combat.
relations: Can be encountered with zombies (as its drones) and might relate to other aquatic or coastal monsters.
environment: Coastal areas and deep waters, but also capable of movement on land.
strengths: Immune to acid, can produce and control drones, and has high durability with significant movement capabilities.
weaknesses: Poor maneuverability on land due to low Dexterity, limited strategic thinking.
attacks: Can bite with strong attacks dealing piercing and acid damage, and launch destructive cannonball-like projectiles.
most_powerful_ability: The Surge allows it to move 400 feet in a straight line, causing massive damage to anything in its path.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings even without sight.
skills: Proficient in deception, with high persuasion abilities in trickery.
additional_information: Creates up to 12 humanoid drones daily at dawn.
Is amphibious, able to breathe air and water.
Can move through objects without provoking attacks of opportunity.
Retains its statistics and equipment when shifting forms.
test_queries: gargantuan ship capable of land and sea movement
amphibious monster that creates undead minions
ship that transforms and moves through objects
large creature with powerful bite and acid attacks
monster that generates drones each day
